alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 3:24PM EST until December 07 at 1:51AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Suwanee Creek near Suwanee affecting Gwinnett County. For the Suwanee Creek...including Suwanee...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suwanee Creek near Suwanee. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The creek is near crest this afternoon and is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
